About Me

Wanna know me? Here you go...

BIO

I am a 20 years old Bangladeshi student, currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Industrial and Production Engineering at BUET. I am a self taught web designer and love to build cool webpages. I grew up in a small village in Sirajganj. I have my parents and a little brother in my family and i love them the most in the world.

EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND

RUMC,MABS,TRVKG

I took my primary education in my own village at our own school named The Riverview Kindergarten. I studied in two different high school. Completed my junior school certificate exam at MABS. I completed my secondary and higher secondary exam from Rajuk Uttara Model College.

SOME THINGS I LOVE

Hobbies and Habit

Beside coding, I like to watch cartoons and play video games. I like to help people. Beside these, i enjoy cooking. In my free time i watch movies and tv series. I love to hangout with my friends. I have so many good friends and some of them really helped me to always stay positive and energetic.

SKILLS

HTML5,CSS3,JS,BOOTSTRAP,WORDPRESS

I have mastered the semantic tags and styling with css. I am good at manipulating DOM usign javascript and js frameworks like react. I am currently working on my front end skills and trying to master the basics of other front end libraries. I have taken course from Udemy, Coursera and various other online education platform for front end development.
